Package io.smudgr.extensions.automate.controls

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AutomatorControl
    An AutomatorControl implements behavior for automatically interacting with any given Parameter.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BeatAutomator
    The BeatAutomator synchronizes with the current Project.getBPM() to adjust a NumberParameter value in sync with the beat.
    DownsampleAutomator
    The DownsampleAutomator will downsample the current Rack according to the current application FPS, to try an achieve the Controller.TARGET_FPS.
    EasingAutomator
    The EasingAutomator attempts to smoothen sharp value changes by easing into a base state after user interaction.
    StepAutomator
    The StepAutomator simply changes a NumberParameter by it's NumberParameter.getStep() every tick.
